title: Find a missing item from your package
content: If an item is missing from your package, please email us at customer.support@fashionfusion.com or give us a call at 1-111-111-1111 and we will help you resolve your issue.

title: What if my order arrives damaged?
content: If your order arrives damaged, please email us at customer.support@fashionfusion.com with a picture of your damaged order and we will help you resolve your issue.

title: How long does it take to get a refund?
content: A refund will be issued at least one business week after returning the package.

title: What is my order status?
content: Check your order history. Each order is displayed with a Status.

title: Why is my card declined?
content: If your card has been declined please navigate to the payments screen in your profile details. Make sure that your payment information is correct and your card has not expired.

title: What are the primary payment methods?
content: The payment methods that we currently support are: Visa, Mastercard, and American Express.
